Package model

Class MSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MShape
      • model.MSquare

  • public class MSquare
extends MShape
    represents a Square. A Square is a rectangular Shape with an equal length at each side. GP2 EA4
    Version:
    1.0 13 Nov 2018
    Author:
    Verena Kauth
